snippet: Three winning regions would each be awarded $500 million to boost their economies if the New York Legislature approves the proposal.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo says he is planning competition for $1.5 billion in grants as means of revitalizing depressed upstate communities; competition for three separate $500 million grants would begin in April 2015.
lead_paragraph: Three winning regions would each be awarded $500 million to boost their economies if the New York Legislature approves the proposal.

headline.main: Cuomo Wants $1.5 Billion Contest for Upstate Revitalization Grants
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Plans Competition Over Grants for Upstate
